name: BorreliaSpeciesTestsForNucleicAcid
title: Borrelia species (Tests for Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia species nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Borrelia sp; NAA),(Exclusion Criteria: Borrelia burgdoreri/afzelii/garinii/mayonii/hermsii/parkerii/turicatae  nucleic acid)
